DOC.brief_summary: This study recruit woman post partum pre-eclampsia match control without postpartum pre-eclampsia identify epigenetic signature specific woman post partum pre-eclampsia help characterize underlying pathophysiology post partum pre-eclampsia .
DOC.detailed_description: Preeclampsia ( PEC ) heterogeneous disease complicate 5-8 % pregnancy . Approximately 10 % PEC patient present post-partum PEC without develop syndrome pregnancy ( PP-PEC ) . Management post-partum preeclampsia ( PP-PEC ) challenge many woman seek care neurologic symptom result severe-range elevate blood pressure . The pathogenesis clinical characteristic PP-PEC understudy poorly understood . Identifying clinical risk factor biomarkers PP-PEC would help identify woman risk .
DOC.criteria: Post partum preeclampsia Matching base : maternal age ( year +/3 ) BMI ( +/5 point ) Ethnicity Mode delivery Gestational age delivery ( +/7 day ) Smoking status Intrapartum preeclampsia
